constantValues: The details of a healthcare service available at a location.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.

members.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.

members.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.

members.name: appointmentRequired

constantValues: Indicates whether or not a prospective consumer will require an appointment for a particular service at a site to be provided by the Organization. Indicates if an appointment is required for access

members.description: Indicates whether or not a prospective consumer will require an appointment for a particular service at a site to be provided by the Organization. Indicates if an appointment is required for access

members.name: availabilityExceptions

constantValues: A description of site availability exceptions, e.g. public holiday availability. Succinctly describing all possible exceptions to normal site availability as details in available/ not available times.

members.description: A description of site availability exceptions, e.g. public holiday availability. Succinctly describing all possible exceptions to normal site availability as details in available/ not available times.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: categoryId

constantValues: Identifies the broad category of service being performed or delivered.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Identifies the broad category of service being performed or delivered.

members.name: comment

constantValues: Any additional description of the service and/or any specific issues not covered by the other attributes, which can be displayed as further detail under the serviceName.

members.description: Any additional description of the service and/or any specific issues not covered by the other attributes, which can be displayed as further detail under the serviceName.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: eligibilityId

constantValues: Does this service have specific eligibility requirements that need to be met in order to use the service?

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Does this service have specific eligibility requirements that need to be met in order to use the service?

members.name: eligibilityNote

constantValues: Describes the eligibility conditions for the service.

members.description: Describes the eligibility conditions for the service.

members.name: extraDetails

constantValues: Extra details about the service that can't be placed in the other fields.

members.description: Extra details about the service that can't be placed in the other fields.

members.name: healthcareService

constantValues: The details of a healthcare service available at a location.

members.description: The details of a healthcare service available at a location.

members.name: healthcareServiceId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances

members.name: name

constantValues: Further description of the service as it would be presented to a consumer while searching.

members.description: Further description of the service as it would be presented to a consumer while searching.

members.name: notAvailableDescription

constantValues: The closing time of day. Note: If the AllDay flag is set, then this time is ignored.

members.description: The closing time of day. Note: If the AllDay flag is set, then this time is ignored.

members.name: notAvailableDuringEndDateTime

constantValues: End time with inclusive boundary, if not ongoing

members.description: End time with inclusive boundary, if not ongoing

members.name: notAvailableDuringStartDateTime
members.description: Starting time with inclusive boundary

foreignKeyAttribute.name: providedById

constantValues: The organization that provides this healthcare service.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The organization that provides this healthcare service.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display
